Map File Cotains Unexisting Tag

Since:
Last Modified: $Date: 2004/04/19 15:52:45 $

Test Steps:

  1. Select a map file
  2. Add an entry line which refers to an existing project but change its tag to a never used one
  3. Save the map file
  4. Right click the map file having the entry
  5. Click Team->Load Map Projects

Expected Results:

Error occured: No such tag
